statements: UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET tip_description = 'Always keep your belongings secure' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET precautions = 'Avoid sharing your travel itinerary with strangers' WHERE tip_id = 2;
UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET precautions = 'Always keep your valuables in a secure place' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET tip_description = 'Stay alert and be aware of your surroundings' WHERE tip_id = 2;
UPDATE travel_safety_tips SET safety_level = 2 WHERE tip_id = 5;
UPDATE travel_precautions SET precaution_location = 'Airport' WHERE precaution_id = 3;
UPDATE travel_safety_tips SET safety_level = 3, tip_description = 'Always carry a first aid kit' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_precautions SET precaution_description = 'Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas', precaution_location = 'City center' WHERE precaution_id = 2;
UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET tip_description = 'Always keep your belongings secured' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_precautions SET precaution_details = 'Avoid displaying expensive items in public' WHERE precaution_id = 2;
UPDATE solo_travel_safety_tips SET tip_title = 'Carry Emergency Contacts', tip_description = 'Always have a list of emergency contacts with you' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_destination SET safety_level = 'High' WHERE destination_id = 3;
UPDATE travel_safety_tips SET tip_description = 'Always carry a copy of your passport' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_reviews SET review_rating = 5, reviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE destination_id = 3 AND review_id = 2;
UPDATE travel_reviews SET review_rating = 4, reviewer_name = 'Alice' WHERE review_id = 1
UPDATE travel_destinations SET destination_name = 'Paris' WHERE destination_id = 3
UPDATE SoloTravelTips SET tip_title = 'Packing Tips' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TravelChecklist SET description = 'Check the weather forecast before packing' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE SoloTravelTips SET tip_description = 'Updated tip description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TravelWarnings SET country_name = 'France', warning_description = 'High risk of pickpocketing' WHERE id = 3;
